name: TimeMachine

types.name: TimeMachine
types.comment: Main data type to hold time machine state.

values.name: mayRedo
values.comment: Same as `undo` but returns `Nothing` if there is no future state.

values.name: mayUndo
values.comment: Same as `undo` but returns `Nothing` if there is no past state.

values.name: modify
values.comment: The way to edit crew (i.e., model in the `TimeMachine`) from outside of the time machine.

values.name: putOff
values.comment: The way to put the crew off.

values.name: redo
values.comment:
A function to get future state of the model.
If no more future state exists, just returns as it is.

values.name: succeed
values.comment:
The `succeed` just put a model into the time machine.
This is the first step if you want to enable the model to undo/redo.

values.name: undo
values.comment:
A function to get past state of the model.
If no more past state exists, just returns as it is.
